de.thesycon.usbio
Class UsbIoReader

java.lang.Object
  de.thesycon.usbio.UsbIo
      de.thesycon.usbio.UsbIoPipe
          de.thesycon.usbio.UsbIoThread
              de.thesycon.usbio.UsbIoReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, UsbIoErrorCodes, UsbIoInterface, UsbSpec
public abstract class UsbIoReader
extends UsbIoThread

This class implements a worker-thread that continuously reads a data stream from a pipe.

Note that this class is derived from UsbIoThread which provides the basic handling of the internal worker-thread.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Thesycon

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

run

public void run()
The main routine that is executed by the worker-thread.

This function implements the main loop of the worker-thread. It submits all buffers from the internal buffer pool to the driver and waits for the completion of the first buffer.

ThreadRoutine can be overloaded by a derived class to implement a different behavior.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Specified by:
run in class UsbIoThread
